description: Worked on SaaS platforms including Service101, LexHost, and Translate-a-Bill.
Implemented SEO optimization using Server Side Rendering (SSR) in Next.js improving search visibility.
Built dashboards, role-based access systems, and document workflows using Supabase and PostgreSQL.
Collaborated with international stakeholders (USA, UK) in agile sprint delivery cycles.
Built MERN stack applications with authentication and admin dashboards.
Improved UI performance and responsiveness by 35%.
Converted Figma designs into reusable React components reducing development time.
Developed modular UI components using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Improved loading performance by 25% using lazy loading and code splitting.
